original_title: The Funny World of Lucy: Volume 2
overview: In THE FUNNY WORLD OF LUCY, VOLUME 2, you'll watch as Lucy & Desi turn their success in I LOVE LUCY into a multi-million dollar enterprise, creating new shows like "December Bride" and "The Untouchables."  See Lucy, Ricky and Ethel in an extremely rare behind-the-scenes adventure at Desilu Studios.  Watch as the Queen of Television turns Mr. Television, Milton Berle's luck sour in Las Vegas.
title: The Funny World of Lucy: Volume 2
